title: The New Pupil
description: When rebellious Ashley Prestwick finds herself spending her senior year at a Swiss boarding school she resigns herself to a year of boredom. That quickly changes when she meets the school's young, wealthy benefactor Othman Grobeus. Othman is witty, charming and gorgeous, and dating her new friend Grace, but Othman also has a darker secret that will unleash Ashley's innermost desires. ADULT CONTENT
author: Damon Close
